com.feilong.core.util.comparator

Class PropertyComparator<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.feilong.core.util.comparator.PropertyComparator<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the generic type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Comparator<T>

    public class PropertyComparator<T>
extends Object
implements Comparator<T>, Serializable
    属性比较器,自动获取 T中的属性名字是 propertyName的值,进行比较,不用每个需要排序的字段创建 Comparator类.

    关于 propertyName:

    propertyName 取出来的值,必须实现 Comparable接口,比如 Integer, String等类型

    顺序:

    该类默认是正序的形式,如果需要反序,请再使用 ReverseComparator进行包装

    Since:
    1.2.0
    Author:
    feilong
    See Also:
    ComparatorUtils, "org.springframework.beans.support.PropertyComparator", BeanComparator, BooleanComparator, ReverseComparator, ComparableComparator, java- lang-illegalargumentexception-comparison-method-violates-its-general-contr, Java error: Comparison method violates its general contract, Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • PropertyComparator

        public PropertyComparator(String propertyName)
        The Constructor.

        示例:

         List<User> list = new ArrayList<>();
 list.add(new User(12L, 18));
 list.add(new User(2L, 36));
 list.add(new User(5L, 22));
 list.add(new User(1L, 8));
 
 Collections.sort(list, new PropertyComparator<User>("id"));
 LOGGER.debug(JsonUtil.format(list));
        返回: 
                [{
                "id": 1,
                "age": 8
            },
                    {
                "id": 2,
                "age": 36
            },
                    {
                "id": 5,
                "age": 22
            },
                    {
                "id": 12,
                "age": 18
        }]
        Parameters:
        propertyName - 指定bean对象排序属性名字(默认正序).

        泛型T对象指定的属性名称,Possibly indexed and/or nested name of the property to be modified,参见 propertyName,
        该属性的value 必须实现 Comparable接口.

      • PropertyComparator

        public PropertyComparator(String propertyName,
                  Comparator comparator)
        The Constructor.
        Parameters:
        propertyName - 指定bean对象排序属性名字(默认正序).

        泛型T对象指定的属性名称,Possibly indexed and/or nested name of the property to be modified,参见 propertyName,
        该属性的value 必须实现 Comparable接口.

        comparator - the comparator
        Since:
        1.5.4

      • PropertyComparator

        public PropertyComparator(String propertyName,
                  Class<? extends Comparable> propertyValueConvertToClass)
        The Constructor.

        使用场景:

        诸如需要排序的对象指定属性类型是数字,但是申明类型的时候由于种种原因是字符串,
        此时需要排序,如果不转成Integer比较的话,字符串比较13 将会在 3数字的前面

        示例:

        我们现在有这样的数据,其中属性 totalNo是字符串类型的 

         CourseEntity courseEntity1 = new CourseEntity();
 courseEntity1.setTotalNo("3");
 
 CourseEntity courseEntity2 = new CourseEntity();
 courseEntity2.setTotalNo("13");
 
 List<CourseEntity> courseList = new ArrayList<>();
 courseList.add(courseEntity1);
 courseList.add(courseEntity2);
        如果 我们只是使用 propertyName进行排序的话: 
         Collections.sort(courseList, new PropertyComparator<CourseEntity>("totalNo"));
 LOGGER.debug(JsonUtil.format(courseList));
        那么返回: 
         [{
 "totalNo": "13",
 "name": ""
 },{
 "totalNo": "3",
 "name": ""
 }]
        如果我们使用 propertyName+ propertyValueConvertToClass进行排序的话: 
         Collections.sort(courseList, new PropertyComparator<CourseEntity>("totalNo", Integer.class));
 LOGGER.debug(JsonUtil.format(courseList));
        返回: 
         [{
 "totalNo": "3",
 "name": ""
 },{
 "totalNo": "13",
 "name": ""
 }]
        Parameters:
        propertyName - 指定bean对象排序属性名字(默认正序).

        泛型T对象指定的属性名称,Possibly indexed and/or nested name of the property to be modified,参见 propertyName,
        该属性的value 必须实现 Comparable接口.

        propertyValueConvertToClass - 反射提取出来的值,需要类型转成到的类型
        Since:
        1.5.0

      • PropertyComparator

        public PropertyComparator(String propertyName,
                  Class<? extends Comparable> propertyValueConvertToClass,
                  Comparator comparator)
        The Constructor. *

        使用场景:

        此时需要排序,如果不转成Integer比较的话,字符串比较13 将会在 3数字的前面
